code: var convertTime=function convertTime(ms){if(!ms){throw new Error('No value provided');}if(typeof ms!=='number'){throw new Error('Provided value must be a number');}var seconds=Math.floor(ms/1000);var minutes=Math.floor(ms/1000/60%60);var hours=Math.floor(ms/1000/60/60);var result='';if(hours===1){result+=hours+' hour ';}else if(hours>1){result+=hours+' hours ';}if(minutes===1){result+=minutes+' minute';}else if(minutes>1){result+=minutes+' minutes';}if(hours===0&&minutes===0){if(seconds===1){result+=seconds+' second';}else if(seconds>1){result+=seconds+' seconds';}}return result;};export default convertTime;
